Document.name: UnboxValue
Document.summary: Unbox an reflectable object. Its type cannot be generic.
Document.param: The type descriptor of the object (optional).
The name of the object to provide a friendly exception message if the conversion is failed (optional).
Document.signature: template < typename T > T UnboxValue( Value const & value, ITypeDescriptor * typeDescriptor /* optional */, WString const & valueName /* optional */ );
